languages.text: "Даже Комморра не смогла заставить вас надолго оставить ваш пост подле Лорд-капитана".
"Not even Commorragh could make you leave your post at the Lord Captain's side for long."
languages.original_text: "Даже Комморра не смогла заставить вас надолго оставить ваш пост подле Лорд-капитана".

traits.locale_text: "Not even Commorragh could make you leave your post at the Lord Captain's side for long."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not even Commorragh could make you leave your post at the Lord Captain's side for long."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not even Commorragh could make you leave your post at the Lord Captain's side for long."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not even Commorragh could make you leave your post at the Lord Captain's side for long."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “即使是在科摩罗，你也不会抛弃守护舰长大人的职责。”
languages.original_text: "Not even Commorragh could make you leave your post at the Lord Captain's side for long."

traits.locale_text: “即使是在科摩罗，你也不会抛弃守护舰长大人的职责。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Si même un antre démoniaque comme Commorragh ne peut pas vous séparer bien longtemps {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, je ne sais pas ce qui y parviendra... »
languages.original_text: "Not even Commorragh could make you leave your post at the Lord Captain's side for long."

traits.locale_text: « Si même un antre démoniaque comme Commorragh ne peut pas vous séparer bien longtemps {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, je ne sais pas ce qui y parviendra... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Ni siquiera Commorragh ha podido alejarle de su puesto junto a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán durante mucho tiempo».
languages.original_text: "Not even Commorragh could make you leave your post at the Lord Captain's side for long."

traits.locale_text: «Ni siquiera Commorragh ha podido alejarle de su puesto junto a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán durante mucho tiempo».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「コモラフでさえ、ロード・キャプテンの右腕という立場を長くは奪えなかったな」
languages.original_text: "Not even Commorragh could make you leave your post at the Lord Captain's side for long."

traits.locale_text: 「コモラフでさえ、ロード・キャプテンの右腕という立場を長くは奪えなかったな」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Nicht einmal Commorragh konnte Euch dazu bringen, Euren Posten an der Seite des Lord Captains lange zu verlassen."
languages.original_text: "Not even Commorragh could make you leave your post at the Lord Captain's side for long."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht einmal Commorragh konnte Euch dazu bringen, Euren Posten an der Seite des Lord Captains lange zu verlassen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Not even Commorragh could make you leave your post at the Lord Captain's side for long."

languages.text: "Commorragh bile Lord Kaptan'ın yanındaki görev yerini uzun süre terk etmeni sağlayamamış."
languages.original_text: "Not even Commorragh could make you leave your post at the Lord Captain's side for long."

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh bile Lord Kaptan'ın yanındaki görev yerini uzun süre terk etmeni sağlayamaz."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
